text: Wow, Apple is a lot older than I thought. Never forget when I won an iPad nano in 2011, bought my first iPhone 4 in 2014. My first iPad in 2016, and my first MacBook in 2019
I was two months old… Good to know we both have the same age…
Maybe they’ll actually release good product now they are a year wiser

The innovators. Creatives. Masters of design. Both in hardware and software. Seamless operation. 
Apple’s shaped how we work, create, and live. Happy 49th!

Wow, well happy birthday Apple.

I has been an interesting 49 years to say the least.
Highest valued company in the world at the moment!
Perfect day to fool everyone! And since then we are been fooled to buy stuff we don’t need!
That’s a good April Fools joke!
Perjury in pursuit of unlawful trademark infringement to conceal theft of brand identity
We share bday so gift me

Thanks Apple for giving me a job I love — and for constantly changing the App Store algorithm so I never get bored! 
Honestly, without your updates every 6 months, I’d have burned out by now — but instead, it’s a party every time! 
#HappyBirthdayApple #ASOlife
49 years and the Mail app still sucks!
Happy birthday to  @Apple the best company of the tech industry Masha’Allah, Alhamdulillah 
49 years of selling us the same phone with a different name.
Happy birthday to the best tech company
